contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Photo Exhibition: Plants of the Qur'anic Botanic Garden

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation is organizing, in collaboration with the Qatar Photography Society and Katara, the first exhibition of its kind in the world under the title 'Plants from Qur’anic Botanic Garden'.

The exhibition will include artworks of all the plants mentioned in the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah.

Opening Date:19/4/2014 12:00 AM
Closing Date:7/5/2014 11:04 AM
Location:Katara, Building No. 18
